name: MwK-Musics PyTGcalls
description: Telegram Bot to Play Audio And Live Streams in PyTGcalls

API_ID.description: api_id part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: api_hash part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot token of Bot, get from @Botfather

CHAT.description: ID of Channel or Group where the Bot plays Music

LOG_GROUP.description: ID of the group to send playlist If CHAT is a Group, if channel thenleave blank

ADMINS.description: ID of Users who can use Admin commands seperated by space)

STREAM_URL.description: URL of Radio station or Youtube live video url to stream with /r command

ADMIN_ONLY.description: Make All Commands Admin Only Usable Y/N

DUR.description: Keep This Blank if you dont now what it is, Maximum duration of song to play.(Optional)
